102516.text: serviceOwnsFrontendIP shouldn't report error when the public IP doesn't match
102516.markdown: ServiceOwnsFrontendIP shouldn't report error when the public IP doesn't match ([#102516](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/102516), [@nilo19](https://github.com/nilo19)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
102516.author: nilo19

102925.text: Fix scoring for NodeResourcesMostAllocated and NodeResourcesBalancedAllocation plugins when nodes have containers with no requests. This was leaving to under-utilization of small nodes.
102925.markdown: Fix scoring for NodeResourcesMostAllocated and NodeResourcesBalancedAllocation plugins when nodes have containers with no requests. This was leaving to under-utilization of small nodes. ([#102925](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/102925), [@alculquicondor](https://github.com/alculquicondor)) [SIG Scheduling]
102925.author: alculquicondor

102969.text: vSphere: Fix regression during attach disk if datastore is within a storage folder or datastore cluster.
102969.markdown: VSphere: Fix regression during attach disk if datastore is within a storage folder or datastore cluster. ([#102969](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/102969), [@gnufied](https://github.com/gnufied)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
102969.author: gnufied

103133.text: Switch scheduler to generate the merge patch on pod status instead of the full pod
103133.markdown: Switch scheduler to generate the merge patch on pod status instead of the full pod ([#103133](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/103133), [@marwanad](https://github.com/marwanad)) [SIG Scheduling]
103133.author: marwanad

103235.text:
Updates the following images to pick up CVE fixes:
- `debian` to v1.8.0
- `debian-iptables` to v1.6.5
- `setcap` to v2.0.3
103235.markdown:
Updates the following images to pick up CVE fixes:
  - `debian` to v1.8.0
  - `debian-iptables` to v1.6.5
  - `setcap` to v2.0.3 ([#103235](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/103235), [@thejoycekung](https://github.com/thejoycekung)) [SIG API Machinery, Release and Testing]
